thread.title: 2015 Outer Banks Seafood Festival Vacation Offer Gives Visitors More Value for Their Money
thread.title_full: 2015 Outer Banks Seafood Festival Vacation Offer Gives Visitors More Value for Their Money - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: 2015 Outer Banks Seafood Festival Vacation Offer Gives Visitors More Value for Their Money
text:
Southern Shores Realty
Southern Shores Realty announces vacation rental packages for the 2015 Outer Banks Seafood Festival
OUTER BANKS, N.C., Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The third Outer Banks Seafood Festival is slated to take place on October 17, 2015 . This annual event draws tens of thousands of visitors from across the east coast to indulge in tasty local seafood as well as learn about the infrastructure and economic significance of Outer Banks fisheries.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150915/266619LOGO
Southern Shores Realty is providing visitors with two packages to help enhance their visit to the OBX during this festival weekend. Those reserving a full week's stay in a participating vacation homes receive $100 in "SeaBucks" (the currency of the festival) plus 5 admission tickets. A partial stay offer is also available, offering $40 in "SeaBucks" and 2 admission tickets for 3+ nights in select homes.
Partial stays or "mini-vacations" are growing in popularity on the Outer Banks, namely for special events, says Southern Shores Realty's General Manager, David Watson . "Our guests find they can pay less money than a hotel room and get all the comforts of a whole home. We've coupled that value with a great offer for the festival... so it should be a clear choice for the event."
To take advantage of this offer, guests must visit Southern Shores Realty's Outer Banks Seafood Festival offer page , and then call 800-334-1000 to complete their reservations over the phone no later than 10/4/15.
About Southern Shores Realty:
Southern Shores Realty is the longest operating vacation rental company on the Outer Banks of North Carolina. They have been in business since 1947 and represent over 600 Outer Banks rentals. Visit www.SouthernShores.com today to start making your own Outer Banks vacation memories.
Media Contact:
Robert Kissell, Jr.
252.261.2000 x602
